viewership-numbers.description: [Group by features] Category header for viewership number features

enable-all.description: Tag for enabling all features within a category

summary-all.description: Tag for a category with an 'enable all' button; used when said button is true.

summary-individual.description: Tag for a category with an 'enable all' button; used when said button is false

sidebar-viewers.description: Label for the Twitch sidebar viewer count setting

channel-live-viewcount.description: Label for enabling / disabling viewer counts on a livestream setting

category-viewcount.description: Label for the category viewer count setting

vod-browse-viewcount.description: Label for the viewcount when browsing on the home page / a channel's VODs

currently-live.description: Label for the live viewership numbers under a VOD when watching a VOD from a live channel

featured-stream.description: Label for the viewcount present under the featured stream on the homepage carousel

follower-count-header.description: [Group by features] Category header for follower count settings

browse-header.description: [Group by location]: Category header for browse page settings

tc-ad.description: Label for TwitchCon banner ads setting

subtember-ad.description: Label for subtember banner ads setting

hypetrain-cat.description: [Group by feature]: Category header for hypetrains

todo.description: Message for indicating that a feature hasn't yet been implemented

uptime-cat.description: [Group by feature -- likely to change]: Stream uptime header

by-loc.description: Option for grouping all settings for the extension by location

by-feat.description: Option for grouping all settings for the extension by feature

issue.description: Text asking if a user has found an issue

report-link.description: Link telling people to report a bug

license-tag.description: Text indicating that the extension is licensed under a specific license (in this case the MIT License)
